titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Edwin and Laura : approximately 1800-1850, a poem in two cantos,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.unittitle: Edwin and Laura : a poem in two cantos,
did.abstract: Four small volumes containing a manuscript entitled "Edwin and Laura: A Poem in Two Cantos." The original poem fills two of these volumes, while the remaining two contain a revised version of the original. All of the volumes probably date from the first half of the 19th century. The author of the poem is unknown, and names of people and places mentioned in the volumes have been intentionally obscured.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Edwin and Laura : approximately 1800-1850, a poem in two cantos,, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, September 2018.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Four small volumes containing a manuscript entitled "Edwin and Laura: A Poem in Two Cantos." The original poem fills two of these volumes, while the remaining two contain a revised version of the original. All of the volumes probably date from the first half of the 19th century. The author of the poem is unknown, and names of people and places mentioned in the volumes have been intentionally obscured.

odd.p: Formerly known as Anonymous poem ("Edwin and Laura"), n.d.
